content: Tuur — I’ve come to know you as a thoughtful and insightful analyst of the crypto-scene, so thank you for what you’ve contributed. When I look at the members of the EntETHAlliance, I see some companies that I know *well* enough to feel fully justified in claiming the following: They do not have greater insight or clarity than you as regards the current state or future of Ethereum <full stop> So, back to bed with you — wishing you a good night’s sleep. mytwocentimes
